st: hichkiyan dilakar uljhan badha rahe ho,
s:
hichkiyan dilakar uljhan badha rahe ho,
aankhein band hai phir bhi nazar aa rahe ho,
itna bata do hamein yaad kar rahe ho,
ye sirf apni yaad dila rahe ho.

st: Teri aankh mein jo nami si chayi hai,
s:
Teri aankh mein jo nami si chayi hai,
Wo mere door hone ki eklauti gawahi hai,
yaad itna na kiya karo hume,
hichki le le kar meri jaan pe ban jati hai.

st: Hum dekhte hai use jo na dekhe hame,
s:
Hum dekhte hai use jo na dekhe hame,
Hum chahte hai use jo na chahe hame,
yahi aadat rahi sada zindagi mein hamari,
Hum yaad rakhte hai use jo bhul jate hai hame.

st: Chahat Ki Raah Mein Bhikre Armaan Bahot Hai,
s:
Chahat Ki Raah Mein Bhikre Armaan Bahot Hai,
Hum Uski Yaad Mein Pareshan Bahot Hai,
Wo Har Baar Dil Todta Hai Ye Keh Kar,
Meri Ummedon Ki Duniya Me Abi Mukam Bahut Hai.

st: agar jawab doge to baat karenge,
s:
agar jawab doge to baat karenge,
nahi doge to intezaar karenge,
dosti ki hai aapse isliye marte dam tak,
aap ko har pal yuhi yaad karenge.

st: Jab se teri chahat apni zindagi bana li hai,
s:
Jab se teri chahat apni zindagi bana li hai,
hum ne udhas rehne ki adat bana li ha
har din har rat guzrta he teri yaad mein,
teri yad hum ne apni ebadat bana li hai.

st: Aapki yaad aati hai to kabhi aankhe bheeg jaati hai,
s:
Aapki yaad aati hai to kabhi aankhe bheeg jaati hai,
To kabhi yaado mein raate beet jaati hai,
Koshish to bahut ki par yaadein to yaadein hai,
Kabhi hum haar jaate hai, Kabhi yaadein jeet jaati hai.

st: Ho sake to hamari yaad sath rakhna,
s:
Ho sake to hamari yaad sath rakhna,
Dosti ka itna to ehsaas paas rakhna,
aap ki duaon se milegi khushiya mujhe,
ye soch kar har dua mein mujhe yaad rakhna.

st: Koi Lamha Iss Kadar Yaad Aata Hai,
s:
Koi Lamha Iss Kadar Yaad Aata Hai,
Beeta Hua Kal Nazar Aata Hai,
Yaade Sath Rehti Hai Yaad Aane Ke Liye,
Waqt Leke Sab Kuch Guzar Jata Hai.

st: kisse teri nazar ne sunaye na phir kabhi,
s:
kisse teri nazar ne sunaye na phir kabhi,
hum ne bhi dil ke daag dikhaye na phir kabhi,
aye dosto ki yaad aaj tu jee bhar ke dil dukha,
shayad ye raat hijar ki aaye na phir kabhi.

st: Pehle Kabhi Yaado Me Tanhai Na Thi,
s:
Pehle Kabhi Yaado Me Tanhai Na Thi,
Kabhi Dil Pe Madhosi Chayi Na Thi,
Jaane Kya Asar Kar Gayi Aapki Baate,
Warna Iss Tarah Kabhi Yaad Kisi Ki Aayi Na Thi.

st: Har raat koi ek dhoon gungunati hai,
s:
Har raat koi ek dhoon gungunati hai,
har phool se mehak zarur aati hai,
apke mann mein chahe hamara khayl tak na ho,
par hame to har waqt aapki yaad aati hai.

st: Suraj pass ho na ho, Roshni aas-pas rehti hai,
s:
Suraj pass ho na ho, Roshni aas-pas rehti hai,
Chand paas ho na ho, Chandni aas-pas rehti hai,
Waise hi aap paas ho na ho,
aapki Yaadein hamesha paas rehti hai.

st: Hawa Ke Jhoko Ka Hisab Kya Rakhna,
s:
Hawa Ke Jhoko Ka Hisab Kya Rakhna,
Jo Bit Gaya Use Yaad Kya Rakhna,
Bas Yahi Soch Kar Muskura Diye Hum,
Ki Apni Udasi Se Dusro Ko Udhas Kya Rakhna.

st: Raat hai bohat thandi hawa chal rahi hai,
s:
Raat hai bohat thandi hawa chal rahi hai,
Yaad mein aapki kisi ki muskan khil rahi hai,
Unke Sapno ki duniya mein aap kho jao,
Aankhe karo band or chain se soo jao.

st: Kitni jaldi ye mulakat gujar jaati hai,
s:
Kitni jaldi ye mulakat gujar jaati hai,
Pyaas bujhti nahi barsaat gujar jaati hai,
Apni yaadon se kaho iss kadar na aaya kare,
Neend aati nahi aur raat guzar jaati hai.

st: Samjha do apni yadoon ko,
s:
Samjha do apni yadoon ko,
wo bin bulaye paas aaya karti hai,
aap to door reh kar satate ho magar,
wo paas aakar rulaya karti hai.

st: Ek Tasveer Jo Khawabo Ko Saja Jati Hai,
s:
Ek Tasveer Jo Khawabo Ko Saja Jati Hai,
Kitne Soye Hue Jazbaat ko Jaga Jati Hai,
Aaj Bhi Unki Yaadein Akele Mein,
Muskan Ban Kar Lab Par Khil Jati Hai.

st: Teri Yaadon Ke Bikhre Tukde bun kar,
s:
Teri Yaadon Ke Bikhre Tukde bun kar,
Guzre Lamho Ki Tasveer Bana Loon,
Apni Har Khushi Tere Naam Likh Ke,
Tere Dukho Ko Apni Taqdeer Bana Loon.

st: Agar Aasman Ko Neend Aaye To Sulau Kaha ?
s:
Agar Aasman Ko Neend Aaye To Sulau Kaha ?
Dharti Ko Maut Aaye To Dafnau Kaha ?
Sagar Mein Lehar Aaye To Chupau Kaha ?
Jab Mujhe Teri Yaad Aaye To Jaau Kaha ?

st: Uss Se Kehna Hum Maje Main Hai,
s:
Uss Se Kehna Hum Maje Main Hai,
Bas Yaadein Bohat Satati Hai,
Unn Ki Doori Ka Gham Nahi Mujhe,
Bas Zara Aankhein Bheeg Jati Hai.

st: Roshni Kya Hui Raat Ko Bhool Gaye,
s:
Roshni Kya Hui Raat Ko Bhool Gaye,
Suraj Kya Nikla Chand Ko Bhool Gaye,
Mana nahi hui mulaqat kuch dino se,
Aap To Hume Yaad Karna Hi Bhool Gaye.

st: Tu Yaad Kare Na Kare Teri Khushi,
s:
Tu Yaad Kare Na Kare Teri Khushi,
Hum To Tujhe Yaad Karte Rehte Hai,
Tujhe Dekhne Ko Dil Tarsata Hai,
Hum To Intezaar Karte Rehte Hai.

st: Umar ki raah me raaste badal jate hai,
s:
Umar ki raah me raaste badal jate hai,
Waqt ki andhi me insaan badal jate hai,
Sochte hai tumhe itna yaad na kare lekin
aankhe band karte hi irade badal jate hai.

st: Naam-E-Mohabbat Se Khushbu-E-Wafa Aati Hai,
s:
Naam-E-Mohabbat Se Khushbu-E-Wafa Aati Hai,
Mere Dil Se Teri Dhadkan Ki Sada Aati Hai,
Jab Bhi Karte Ho Yaad Hume Dil Se,
Yu Lagta Hai Jaise Jannat Se Hawa Aati Hai.

st: Har Subah Ki Dhoop Kuch Yaad Dilati Hai,
s:
Har Subah Ki Dhoop Kuch Yaad Dilati Hai,
Har Phool Ki Khushbu Ek Jaadu Jagati Hai,
tumhe Chahu Na Chahu phir bhi mujhe,
Subah-Subah Aapki Yaad Aa Hi Jaati Hai.

st: Haal-e-dil kuch iss tarah hamara hai,
s:
Haal-e-dil kuch iss tarah hamara hai,
Yaad aap ko din me na-jane  kitni bar kiya hai,
Jab na aaye kabhi SMS aap ka to,
purana SMS hi padh kar kiya humne guzara hai.

st: tum Chaho To Hame Dil Se Mita Dena,
s:
tum Chaho To Hame Dil Se Mita Dena,
tum Chaho To Hame Dil Se Bhula Dena,
Magar Aaye Jo Kabhi Meri Yaad, Aye sanam,
tum Rona Mat Sirf dil se Muskura Dena.

st: Zindagi Ki Har Fizaon Mein Yaad Rakhna,
s:
Zindagi Ki Har Fizaon Mein Yaad Rakhna,
Dil Ki Sadaon Mein Yaad Rakhna,
Ye Tohfa Bohat Hai Mere Liye,
Khaloos-E-Dil Se Duaon Me Yaad Rakhna.

st: Har Uss Lamhe Mein Yaad Aaungi,
s:
Har Uss Lamhe Mein Yaad Aaungi,
Jab Tum Tanhai Mein Roya Karoge,
Jagte-Jagte Thak Kar Soya Karoge,
Ankhe Band Hote Hi fir Yaad Aaungi.

st: Unki Ek nazar Ko hum Taraste Rahenge,
s:
Unki Ek nazar Ko hum Taraste Rahenge,
Ye aanshu Har Pal yuhi Baraste Rahenge,
Kabhi Beete The Kuch pal Unke Saath,
Bas Yahi Soch Kar Hum Haste Rahenge.

st: Ajeeb Lagti Hai ye Sham Kabhi-Kabhi,
s:
Ajeeb Lagti Hai ye Sham Kabhi-Kabhi,
Zindagi bhi Lagti Hai Bejaan Kabhi-Kabhi,
Samjh Aaye To Hame Bhi Batana,
kyu Karti Hai Yaade Pareshan Kabhi-Kabhi.
